title: Man left 'fuming' after fellow commuter's bum ends up as his view for train ride
text:

A man has described how he was left "fuming" after a fellow commuter plonked himself down on the train table in front of him instead of taking a seat - meaning the other man's bum was very close to his face.

Paul Neuhardt branded the rail passenger "crass and a bit inconsiderate" following the incident, saying he didn't ask for permission or say "thank you" for letting him sit on the table.

The 57-year-old Operations Manager from Tadworth in Surrey was on his morning journey to London at the time and claims there were a number of proper seats available during the half-hour ride.

(Image: Kennedy News and Media)

Speaking about the experience, Paul said: "I thought it was both crass and a bit incosiderate.

"It was very ego-centric and very self-centred on his part, particularly when as he sat down the thing visibly bent.

"Not only was he doing this rather rudely and inconsiderately but he was potentially causing damage to the table.

"It's not uncommon for someone to get on as the train starts to crowd up and just plop down and use that table right in front of people as a seat."

(Image: Kennedy News and Media)

The father-of-four added: "This particular one I thought was particularly egregious because there were empty seats on the train."

Paul says he didn't say anything to the commuter in question, but simply "sat there and fumed and took a picture of his backside on the table".

He later uploaded the image to social media, writing: "No, really, have a seat. I don't mind having your bum as my view for the rest of the train ride. By all means, have a seat on the table."

More than 200 people commented on the post, sharing their shock at the other man's behaviour.

One person proclaimed: "What a rude w*****!"

Another said: "This would annoy me so much. Such an invasion of personal space!"
description: A man has shared his fury after a commuter on his train decided to sit on the table in front of him instead of on a seat
